overview: Vivi, an optimistic woman with a substandard romantic history, works at a data-driven matchmaking app. Once she discovers that the success rate for matches at her company is low, she hires Raina, an Indian matchmaker, to provide advice on how to improve their numbers. As they embark on this matchmaking journey, Vivi meets Rainaâ€™s spontaneous son, Bhumesh, and questions whether finding love is something one must take control of or let naturally come to them.
title: Make Me a Match
